fortunes revived retired chief conductor later accepted post president although latter part career worked orchestras including london symphony orchestra philharmonia orchestra royal philharmonic  alice chains american rock band formed seattle washington guitarist songwriter jerry cantrell original lead vocalist layne staley initial lineup rounded drummer sean kinney bassist mike starr replaced mike although widely associated grunge music band sound incorporates heavy metal acoustic elements since formation alice chains released four studio albums three live albums four compilations dvds band known distinct vocal style often included harmonized vocals staley cantrell alice chains rose international fame part grunge movement early along seattle bands nirvana pearl soundgarden band  david lovering december american musician magician best known drummer alternative rock band pixies joined band breakup lovering drummed several acts including martinis cracker nitzer tanya donelly also pursued magic career scientific performing scientific physics-based experiments stage pixies reunited lovering returned band drummer drummer lovering inspired bands variety genres including rush steely author sisario described great unacknowledged anchor pixies stated unique influences gave precision versatility essential following black francis songwriting quirks biography youth college david lovering born burlington massachusetts learned play drums teenage years joined high school marching band according friend john murphy lovering always drum oriented musical taste high school yearbook entry lovering stated three main rock band electrical engineer tour rush favorite band graduating high school lovering studied electronic engineering wentworth institute technology boston radio shack store murphy pair often played practical jokes work incident involved lovering wiring store toilet fire alarm graduating wentworth bachelor degree took building lasers continued drum local bands wizard riff raff cited bands number genres influences including steely zeppelin devo pixies memorial lovering attended murphy deal wedding service january deal hired play bass newly-formed pixies alternative rock band formed charles black francis thompson joey santiago murphy suggested lovering audition band still without drummer lovering stopped drumming point first unimpressed trio performance band songs however playing along agreed join lovering band wrote rehearsed material throughout performed small venues boston band decided record songs demo tape lovering co-wrote tape songs levitate major writing contribution pixies appeared cassette front cover jogging naked back turned camera levitate later appeared band first full length release come pilgrim included seven songs  joseph szigeti szigeti september february hungarian violinist born musical family spent early childhood small town transylvania quickly proved child prodigy violin moved budapest father study renowned pedagogue hubay completing studies hubay early teens szigeti began international concert career performances time primarily limited salon-style recitals overtly virtuosic however making acquaintance pianist ferruccio busoni began develop much thoughtful intellectual approach music eventually earned nickname scholarly virtuoso following bout tuberculosis required stay sanatorium switzerland szigeti settled geneva became professor violin local conservatory geneva future wife wanda ostrowska roughly time became friends composer relationships lifelong szigeti performed regularly around world recorded extensively also distinguished strong advocate music dedicatee many works contemporary composers among notable pieces written ernest bloch violin concerto rhapsody solo sonata showed talent violin several years later father took budapest receive proper training conservatory brief stint inadequate teacher szigeti auditioned franz liszt academy music admitted directly class  maynard james keenan james herbert april american rock singer songwriter musician record producer winemaker actor originally ohio keenan spent high school college years michigan serving army early attended kendall college design grand rapids moved angeles california pursue career interior design construction formed band tool adam jones shortly thereafter keenan best known lead singer room wines well food court early life james keenan born ravenna ohio april child judith marie michael loren keenan born baptist family parents divorced father high school teacher moved michigan keenan serve inspiration many creative works years later persuaded keenan live father michigan keenan considers best move ever made inspired bill murray performance comedy film stripes keenan joined united  pearl american rock band formed seattle washington since inception band line-up included eddie vedder stone gossard jeff ament mike mccready band current drummer matt cameron also soundgarden band since formed demise gossard ament previous band mother love bone pearl broke mainstream debut album bands grunge movement early pearl criticized early corporate cash-in alternative rock however  pyotr ilyich tchaikovsky pyotr ilyich november russian composer whose works included symphonies concertos operas ballets chamber music amongst popular concert theatrical music classical repertoire first russian composer whose music made lasting impression internationally bolstered appearances guest conductor later career europe united states appearances inaugural concert carnegie hall york city tchaikovsky honored tsar alexander awarded lifetime pension late although musically precocious tchaikovsky educated career civil servant scant opportunity musical career russia time system public music education opportunity education arose entered nascent saint petersburg conservatory graduated formal western-oriented teaching received apart composers contemporary nationalist movement embodied russian composers five professional relationship mixed tchaikovsky training path reconcile learned native musical practices exposed childhood reconciliation forged personal independent unmistakably russian task prove easy principles governed melody harmony fundamentals russian music completely counter governed western european seemed defeat potential using russian music large-scale western composition forming composite style russian culture exhibited split personality native adopted elements drifted apart increasingly since time peter great resulted uncertainty among intelligentsia country national identity principles russian nationalist artists fundamentally odds supporting european traditions caused personal antipathies dented tchaikovsky self-confidence despite many popular successes tchaikovsky life punctuated personal crises depression contributory factors included leaving mother boarding school mother early death collapse enduring relationship adult life association wealthy widow nadezhda meck same-sex orientation kept private traditionally also considered major factor musicologists play importance sudden death generally ascribed cholera although suicide suggested possibility music remained popular among audiences critical opinions initially mixed russians feel sufficiently representative native musical values suspicious europeans accepted western elements apparent reinforcement latter claim europeans lauded tchaikovsky offering music substantive base exoticism thus transcending stereotypes russian classical music tchaikovsky music dismissed lacking elevated thought according longtime york times music critic harold schonberg formal workings derided deficient following western principles stringently vestiges last claim still remain  smashing pumpkins american alternative rock band formed chicago illinois formed frontman billy corgan vocals lead james band included jimmy chamberlin melissa maur darcy wretzky currently includes mike byrne nicole fiorentino guitar backing jeff schroeder among membership disavowing punk rock roots many alt-rock contemporaries pumpkins diverse densely layered guitar-heavy sound containing elements gothic rock grunge heavy metal dream psychedelic rock progressive rock shoegazer style production later recordings electronica frontman billy corgan group primary grand musical ambitions cathartic lyrics shaped band albums songs described anguished bruised reports billy corgan nightmare-land smashing pumpkins broke musical mainstream second album siamese dream group built audience extensive touring follow-up double album mellon collie infinite sadness debuted number billboard album chart albums sold united states smashing pumpkins commercially successful critically acclaimed bands however internal fighting drug diminishing record sales break-up billy corgan jimmy chamberlin reconvened record smashing pumpkins album zeitgeist band toured rotating lineup five nine musicians  toru takemitsu takemitsu october february japanese composer writer aesthetics music theory largely self-taught takemitsu possessed consummate skill subtle manipulation instrumental orchestral timbre drew wide range influences including jazz popular music avant-garde procedures traditional japanese music harmonic idiom largely derived music claude debussy olivier messiaen requiem strings gained international attention several commissions across world settled reputation leading japanese composers century recipient numerous awards commissions composed film scores concert works ensembles various sizes combinations also found time write detective novel appeared frequently japanese television celebrity chef foreword selection takemitsu writings english conductor seiji ozawa proud friend toru takemitsu first japanese composer write world audience achieve international recognition biography youth takemitsu born tokyo october month later family moved dalian chinese province known manchuria returned japan attend elementary school education short military conscription takemitsu described experience military service young japanese nationalist government extremely bitter takemitsu first became really conscious western classical music banned japan term military service form popular french song listened colleagues secret played gramophone makeshift needle fashioned bamboo post-war occupation japan takemitsu worked armed forces long period hospitalised bed-ridden took opportunity listen much western music could armed forces network deeply affected experiences western
